summary: Learn how video games are made, marketed, and consumed by looking back at gaming history and culture through the eyes of game developers, publishers, and consumers.
cast: Sean Astin|Al Alcorn|Peter Armstrong|Cliff Bleszinski|Zach Braff|Jim Brown|Nolan Bushnell|Louis Castle|Wil Wheaton|Chloe Dykstra|Donald Faison|Brian Fargo|Ed Fries|Chris Hardwick|David Crane|Don James|Wyeth Johnson|Max Landis|Cricket Lee|Casey Lynch|Francis Mao|Peter Molyneux|Rob Pardo|David Perry|Randy Pitchford|Justin Richmond|Harvey Smith|Kudo Tsunoda|Tim Willits|Warren Davis|Robert Workman|Reggie Fils-Aime|Larry Akins|Vincent Argentine|Chuck Beaver|Brittney Brombacher|Mark Cerny|James Charne|Tom Chelius|Edward Chiu|Ernest Cline|Christine Converse|Drew Crowder|Jimmy Fallon|David Fox|Jan Goetgeluk|Clare Grant|Alison Haislip|Craig Harris|Brandon Hulslander|Jackie Izawa|Hideo Kojima|Taylor Kurosaki|Palmer Luckey|Brian Martel|Michael Mason|Marc Merrill|Eric Monacelli|Mike Neumann|Steve Nix|Conan O'Brien|Yoshinori Ono|Mark Rein|Keith Robinson|Mike Sennott|John Sharp|Phil Spencer|Thomas A. Spickard|Karl Stewart|Tommy Tallarico|Grace Wan|Marc Wilhelm|Jeffrey Zedkin
title: Video Games: The Movie
